name: Codename: Agent Cat
description:
Western intelligence services collaborate to identify arms dealer and terrorist base across the dead wasteland. Play as AgentCat (Code name)
to strike against terrorism and enjoy ultimate shoot experience in responsive open world!

You are free to play in any style. Keep your self undetected and take down the terrorist mafia using both off road and on road, by air or by using land with dozens of vehicles and planes.

Locate bombs, enemies have installed and defuse them before time runs out. Use drones before entering any location.
Assemble your vehicle as you go. You need to equip your vehicle with all possible gears to gain power ups.

40+ hours of game play
With Controller support

Enough talk, Let's Play
